traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.description: Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or have the Prone condition.
